ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( !ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(RW_Secondary_Mobile_No__pc)), ISCHANGED( RW_Secondary_Mobile_No__pc), $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $User.Id <> '0050I000009gd3f', $User.Id <> '00528000005Fpi7', $Profile.Name <> "Team Leader", $Label.Disable_all_validations_from_Account == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/ )
